import requests

url = "https://payperuse-test.p.rapidapi.com/Something"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "payperuse-test.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
